import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; const EpmloyerSignup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", companyName: "", companyLocation: "", phoneNumber: "", sector: "", email: "", password: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Make a POST request to the backend API const response = await axios.post( "http://localhost:5000/api/employer/signup", formData ); console.log(response.data); // Display the response from the backend // Handle successful sign-up, show a success message, redirect, etc. } catch (error) { console.error("Error signing up employer:", error); // Handle errors, display error messages, etc. } }; return (
